author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Cabinet to assess ‘stay at home’ measures as 50,000 deaths expected worldwide
description: WHO expects one million confirmed cases and 50,000 deaths worldwide
content:
The Cabinet committee on Covid-19 will meet on Thursday almost a week after new restrictions on movement were announced last Friday. 
The group, chaired by Taoiseach Leo Varadkar, will assess the impact of the measures announced by him in a television addres… [+3092 chars]
